title: Add --awaiting flag to tk create
description:
Add --awaiting flag to the create command

Usage: tk create "title" --awaiting work|approval|input|review|content|escalation|checkpoint

Behavior:
- Set the awaiting field on the new tick
- Tick immediately assigned to human (not picked up by tk next)
- Validate value is one of the 7 awaiting types

Common use case:
  tk create "Configure AWS credentials" --awaiting work
  (Creates task that human must complete, agent cannot do)

Implementation:
- Add -awaiting and --awaiting flags to create FlagSet
- Validate enum value before creating tick

Note: This is the replacement for --manual flag. For backwards compat, --manual will map to --awaiting work.
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] --awaiting flag added to create command
- [ ] All 7 valid values accepted
- [ ] Invalid values rejected with error
- [ ] Field saved correctly to tick JSON
- [ ] Help text documents all awaiting types
closed_reason: Added --awaiting/-a flag to create command with validation for 7 awaiting types (work|approval|input|review|content|escalation|checkpoint). Modified cmd/tk/main.go to add flag parsing, validation, and set Awaiting field on tick struct. Added comprehensive tests in main_test.go.
